Posts.Content: can anybody knows here the odd of getting the cancer back if you missed the doses of your medication for two weeks. I was out of town for two weeks and I lost the bottle of my medication (femara) and I just refill my med after I came back. This is my 4years taking the med I should be off on Femara by September of 2011. can anybody have the answer to my question?
Posts.Title: missed doses of Femara
